description: Discover all validation/schema/standards files across the CodeRef ecosystem to create a unified migration manifest for papertrail consolidation

agent_identification.how_to_identify_your_role: Find your project directory path in communication.json agents[] array and match it to the table below
agent_identification.instruction: If your working directory matches one of the project_path values above, you are that agent. Follow the agent_instructions below. Orchestrator role varies by session.

orchestrator_instructions.role: Consolidate all 9 agent audit reports into unified migration manifest

steps.step_1: READ all 9 agent audit JSON files from their output_file paths
steps.step_2: CATEGORIZE findings into: schemas, validators, standards, QA tools
steps.step_4: CREATE orchestrator-migration-manifest.json with: what exists, where it lives, what moves to papertrail, priority order, conflicts to resolve

agent_instructions.role: Search your project for validation/schema/standards files and report findings

steps.step_1: SEARCH your project for file patterns (see search_patterns below)
steps.step_2: CATEGORIZE each file found into: schema, validator, standards_doc, qa_tool, other
steps.step_3: ANALYZE each file: purpose, dependencies, who uses it
steps.step_4: CREATE audit JSON at your output_file path (see output_template below)
steps.step_5: UPDATE your status in communication.json to 'complete'

output_template.agent_recommendation: {Brief recommendation on what should move to papertrail and why}

should_move_if: File validates external contracts (JSON schemas, file formats)
File enforces naming conventions or standards
File performs quality checks (lint, audit, compliance)
File is reusable across multiple projects
should_NOT_move_if: File is tightly coupled to project code
File is part of build/compile process

quality_standards.completeness: Report ALL files matching search patterns, categorize each one, provide recommendation
quality_standards.accuracy: File paths must be correct, purpose must be clear, used_by must be verified
